attributes.action: Put pressure on the FA to make The Special One (Jose Mourinho) The Next England Football Team Manager
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Given the poor performance of the England Football Team in qualifying for Euro 2008, it is the considered opinion of the undersigned that every effort should be made to put pressure on The FA to secure the services of Jose Mourinho (TSO) as next England Football Team Manager.

Other viable candidates are already in jobs or have ruled themselves out of the running, and failure to act quickly could see the FA having to resort to a second or third choice who will struggle to win the support of the general public.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
